root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-17-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.17 Encourage and promote public partnerships, public-private partnerships and partnerships with civil society, building on the experience acquired and the funding strategies applied in this area17.17.1 Amount (in United States dollars) of resources allocated to public-private partnerships and partnerships with civil societycategory IIICategory III
